text: Daniela Cristine Lionço (born 1 January 1989) is a Brazilian professional racing cyclist. She rides for the Servetto Footon team in 2015, rides for Brasil Pro Cycling in 2016 ==Palmares== ;2015 : 1st 20px National Time Trial Championships : 1 st 20px National Omnium Championships : 1st Prova Ciclística 9 de Julho ;2016 : 4 th National Time Trial Championships : 1st Prova Ciclística 9 de Julho : 1st Shimano Fest Brazil : 1 st 20px National Individual Pursuit Championships ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Daniela Lionço
